text: tap-dancing on camera for the first time
ever recorded at 300 frames per second a
blue capped cordon bleu male dances to
grab the attention of a female perched
nearby with a piece of nesting material
in his beak he sings and Bob's and Wally
Bob's he stomps making non vocal sounds
to accompany his song this tap dancing
is invisible to the naked human eye and
is performed by both males and females
